price: 32. (Ir bus pasakyta): „Visa tai jums buvo prižadėta, tiems kurie (dažnai) atgailauja (Allahui) ir laikosi (Jo nurodymų) –
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
